results.title: Australian tourism [advertisement]
results.brief_description: Developed by Mojo MDA for the Australian Tourism Commission this advertisement was part of the ‘come and say g’day’ campaign and features Paul Hogan in a range of locations across Australia. It also uses a range of Australian slang expressions including a play on the famous expression ‘put another prawn on the barbie’.

results.title: Kiewa catchment farm tree group: a community in action
results.creator_credit: Ian Blythman, John Atkins and Victoria. Dept. of Agriculture and Rural Affairs. North Central Media Unit

video_links.name: Kiewa catchment farm tree group: a community in action

results.brief_description: The Kiewa community formed a tree planting group to combat the problems of land degradation due to the impact of agricultural practices, the effect of tourisism in the area and erosion. This video shows how a small community in the alpine area of north-east Victoria, worked together to deal with an environmental problem.

results.title: AFL: I'd like to see that [advertisement] 1996
results.brief_description: Produced in 1996 to commemorate the Centenary of Australian Rules Football this ad features international celebrities John Lee Hooker (musician), Heather Locklear (actress), Archbishop Desmond Tutu (religious leader) and George Burns (comedian). Produced by Campaign Palace.

results.title: Snow safe
results.creator_credit: Jack Creswick and Australian Ski Patrol Association
results.brief_description: A well produced video looking at all aspects of ski and snow safety. Covers appropriate clothing and equipment, selection of equipment, getting proper ski instruction, ski slope courtesy and behaviour, using lifts, ski slope signs, what to do in case of accident or getting lost, care of children, food and hypothermia, and safe tobogganing. Narrated by Debbie Byrne.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jack Creswick and Australian Ski Patrol Association

Covers appropriate clothing and equipment, selection of equipment, getting proper ski instruction, ski slope courtesy and behaviour, using lifts, ski slope signs, what to do in case of accident or getting lost, care of children, food and hypothermia, and safe tobogganing. Narrated by Debbie Byrne.

results.title: Qantas: I Still Call Australia Home [advertisement]
results.brief_description:
Over twenty years, Qantas has produced a series of commercials featuring the Peter Allen song ‘I Still Call Australia Home’. This is the original mid 1980s version.
Produced by Mojo MDA.

results.title: Early Melbourne: from village to town
results.creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, Lily Steiner, Seven Network Limited (Australia) and TV Ed Productions
results.brief_description: Dr Bernard Barrett, State Historian, discusses the early development of Melbourne, covering such topics as the naming of Melbourne, who decided where the streets would be located and what they would be called.

results.title: World Series Cricket : C'mon Aussie c'mon [advertisement]
results.brief_description:
An advertisement for the first season of World Series Cricket featuring the now famous song ‘C’mon Aussie c’mon’ originally performed by the Mojo Singers.
Produced by Mojo MDA.
